original_text: Saul became very angry with Jonathan. He said, ‘You stupid man! I see that you have turned against me! You have become a friend of that son of Jesse. You have brought shame on yourself. Your mother should be ashamed that she gave birth to you!
korean_text: 사울이 요나단에게 화를 내며 그에게 이르되 패역무도한 계집의 소생아 네가 이새의 아들을 택한 것이 네 수치와 네 어미의 벌거벗은 수치 됨을 내가 어찌 알지 못하랴

sentences.original_text: Saul became very angry with Jonathan.
I see that you have turned against me!
You have become a friend of that son of Jesse.
sentences.korean_translation: 너는 이새의 그 아들의 친구가 되었다.

sentences.original_text: You have brought shame on yourself.
that she gave birth to you!
